name: Insane Escape
description: Surrealistrasyon//Şerif Gümüşbaş//Ink//4500x4500 pixel//It is true that the world is a place where there are many inequalities and problems. But when we run away from them, get angry with them, or fight them, the problems of our mind accompany us. So unfortunately some of our warfare is just the result of an illusion//Drawing is an impressive form of expression for me with its universal and differentiating structure for each viewer. And I like to use automatism as a tool to transfer the impressions I have gained while continuing to research and learn in many disciplines. Because I think this method is a symbolic, mysterious and striking way of expressing
